reviews.text: The service was amazing. Very quick willing to accommodate special asks for a pizza and extremely fast with making the pizza. I cant remember the young Mans name who took my order but he also mad my pie and its had got to be in my top 5 pizzas I've had in recent memory. Nice doughy texture with a glue like cheese and perfectly crisped pepperoni. Great pizza great service. Only downside was the sound from the claw machine but to be fair i did choose to sit right next to it so that ones in me. 9.2/10

We ordered Doordash from here. Not only was the pizza delicious but the gluten free crust actually tasted like traditional crusted pizzas. Thank-you for making something that tastes so good and gluten free.

I ordered a pizza and breadsticks for delivery. First off I love that they deliver themselves and don't contract it out to doordash. The food was still hot and fresh. We got our food in an hour after ordering it, as expected.

Great pizza at a nice clean spot. Restaurant is brand new and very clean. Place to eat inside and out. Tables in the shade during the day. The owner is a nice guy as well, came out and said a few words and talked about his pizza- clearly takes pride in his own restaurant. I would come here again, and would recommend it to everyone as well.

I always get the tipsy chicken. It‚Äôs amazing!!! Last night, our pizza looked like a piece of art and tasted awesome. My 3 yr old loves it too! Delivery dude is so sweet and the lady I called into was very helpful. I used to manage a Donatos and presentation and customer service mean a lot to me.

recentReviews.text: $14.99 deal on XL 2 Topping, great local chain!

The staff is always swift and nice when I come in. They seem to be very organized. I love the atmosphere of the pizzeria. It has its own unique vibe. Ive only ever ordered out. I‚Äôm very picky about my pizza preferences so this place is very dear to me. Their pizza is spot on every time. I highly recommend giving it a try! I don‚Äôt go anywhere else for my pizza!
Truly a great experience! Super smooth and quick service.

We ordered Doordash from here. Not only was the pizza delicious but the gluten free crust actually tasted like traditional crusted pizzas. Thank-you for making something that tastes so good and gluten free.

detailedReviews.author: Terrance Strong
detailedReviews.text: $14.99 deal on XL 2 Topping, great local chain!

detailedReviews.author: Kara Hughes
detailedReviews.text: The staff is always swift and nice when I come in. They seem to be very organized. I love the atmosphere of the pizzeria. It has its own unique vibe. Ive only ever ordered out. I‚Äôm very picky about my pizza preferences so this place is very dear to me. Their pizza is spot on every time. I highly recommend giving it a try! I don‚Äôt go anywhere else for my pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Hyper Detailing
detailedReviews.text: Truly a great experience! Super smooth and quick service.

detailedReviews.author: Whitney Sutton
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!

detailedReviews.author: Jon G
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza and deals!

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Webb
detailedReviews.text: We ordered Doordash from here. Not only was the pizza delicious but the gluten free crust actually tasted like traditional crusted pizzas. Thank-you for making something that tastes so good and gluten free.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Hickey
detailedReviews.text: BEST pizza in Lexington, the Chicago Deep Dish is my favorite.  Only complaint is that they close at 10pm on weekends.  BBC

detailedReviews.author: alex bourne
detailedReviews.text: this place is amazing very warm atmosphere very real and nice employees and the pizza is phenomenal came out hot and fresh

detailedReviews.author: Peter de Souza
detailedReviews.text: Great and attentive customer service, they always get my order correct. Love the pizza!üçï

detailedReviews.author: Rhiannon Clem
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a pizza and breadsticks for delivery. First off I love that they deliver themselves and don't contract it out to doordash. The food was still hot and fresh. We got our food in an hour after ordering it, as expected.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Dicello
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza, I usually get the deep dish Chicago stuffed pizza, always very tasty and worth the price tag in my opinion! Great service and everyone that works there seems to be extremely friendly.

detailedReviews.author: juan leszczynski
detailedReviews.text: Super friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: Laton Jones
detailedReviews.text: THE IS THE BEST PIZZA IN LEXINGTON! THEY NEVER DISAPPOINT! PICK UP AND DELIVERY! EVERY INGREDIENT IS DELICIOUS.  THANK YOU BIG CITY

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Randall
detailedReviews.text: I keep trying to give you all a chance because the food is actually delicious but every single time I have ordered the order has been wrong. This time, the staff was rude and the food took multiple hours when we were told 40 minutes. Do better! Or don't, I won't be back again and I'd say the 20 other customers who complained while I was there waiting, won't be back either! It's a darn shame, so much potential.

detailedReviews.author: Destiny Auxier
detailedReviews.text: I always get the tipsy chicken. It‚Äôs amazing!!! Last night, our pizza looked like a piece of art and tasted awesome. My 3 yr old loves it too! Delivery dude is so sweet and the lady I called into was very helpful. I used to manage a Donatos and presentation and customer service mean a lot to me.

detailedReviews.author: Tracy
detailedReviews.text: There was no flavor and it was missing the main topping I wanted. Management seems to provide a canned response to everyone with no offer to make it right. Will not be returning.

detailedReviews.author: Josh C
detailedReviews.text: Inconsistent quality. Not the best service either. Interior looks run down and old.

detailedReviews.author: Sam Walters
detailedReviews.text: I haven't dined here in 2-3 years, but I used to really enjoy it. Unfortunately, my recent experience was disappointing. The garlic knots were undercooked, leaving them doughy in the center. Additionally, both the BBQ pizza and pepperoni pizza had very little tomato and BBQ sauce, resulting in a dry texture. I was quite let down by this visit.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Riley
detailedReviews.text: Horrible service. This is the THIRD time I've ordered pickup and it wasn't ready after showing up way after the time window. At least 6 people in line dealing with the same thing. Never going back, and it's a shame because I literally live across the street.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Stinnett
detailedReviews.text:
I recently ordered from Big City Pizza and tried a large cheese pizza and a pepperoni pizza with onions, green peppers, and black olives. The cheese pizza was decent ‚Äì nothing spectacular, but it got the job done.

However, the pepperoni pizza was a completely different story. Honestly, it was the worst pizza I‚Äôve ever had. The combination of flavors from the onions and green peppers was overwhelming and just tasted off. It completely ruined the pizza. I‚Äôm not sure if it was the freshness of the toppings or how it was prepared, but it was almost inedible.

Unfortunately, I can‚Äôt say I‚Äôd recommend Big City Pizza based on this experience.

detailedReviews.author: Cynthia Plante
detailedReviews.text: I stopped by Big City Pizza (Chinoe) today for a pizza. I ordered to go and waited in the lobby. The food was ready before I knew it. The service provided by the staff was exceptional. I'll definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Chloe Howlett
detailedReviews.text: Across several locations a consistent issue is wait time. 40 mins for a pizza. They‚Äôll say 20-25, this will not be accurate. Atmosphere is always bad but especially at Hamburg because of the arcade games(basketball machine that kids and their parents break into and play for free by just throwing all the basketballs). The pizza itself is okay, just okay

detailedReviews.author: Helen Coulter
detailedReviews.text: Attempted to order a small 8 pc pizza but had issues. I was informed that it would be $15 min. for delivery +  delivery fees $6 ( total $ 21). I prepaid with my debit card. I was under the impression that the business offered delivery service, but after placing the order I started receiving unknown texts regarding my order that further delivery instructions were needed. I was confused. I called Big City Pizza about this and inquired and was informed that DoorDash was delivering it. I asked why wasn‚Äôt I informed when I ordered but never received a definitive answer and their website doesn‚Äôt mention DoorDash. I kept receiving texts from DoorDash after I had cancelled my order with Big City. Also, a delivery driver from Dash showed up at my door to deliver & I informed her the order was cancelled & to contact Big City. Was very displeased with the unprofessional & misleading service. (Note: i will say the young man initially took my order at Big City was kind & pleasant on the phone.)

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Hagan
detailedReviews.text: It was rlly good highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: EazyMoneySnipez1
detailedReviews.text: Food is always hot and good

detailedReviews.author: Bryon Howard
detailedReviews.text: Great I‚Äôve always eaten here it‚Äôs so good

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Daniel
detailedReviews.text: Cold food left on counter in to go boxes. Bathroom was disgusting! I had to go behind the counter and get my own drink.

detailedReviews.author: Geoff Boone
detailedReviews.text: This place is horrible. 20 people in here waiting and they keep messing up orders.

detailedReviews.author: Kristina Rose
detailedReviews.text:
Oct 2024- first review with photos was 4 years ago. In those four years the quality of this pizza has declined drastically. We ordered three pizzas and boneless ‚Äúwings‚Äù last night. The pizzas were all so so dry and tasted just cheap like gas station pizza. The boneless wings are disgusting,  with meat similar to mcD nuggets, that chicken paste, very mushy and the breading is half as thick as the chicken, but without the crunch of mcD.. The Mac and cheese wedges are also gross, you can tell they come frozen from a box! Now listen, where credit is due is the services they‚Äôre very nice people and I hate to give the business a harsh critique but I‚Äôm sick of these restaurants lowering the quality of their food and keeping prices the same. They may say they haven‚Äôt changed anything in the past 4 years but they absolutely have and if I‚Äôm going to eat trash, I‚Äôll just go to Dominos

2020-This place is so good, so quick, and so sweet! Got a discount due to the quarantine situation.
The staff was great, and so friendly. We live within a mile of the place and come often and always satisfied.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay C (Laithypie)
detailedReviews.text: Just ordered through doordash. Damn this pizza is perfect!

detailedReviews.author: Woodrow Friend
detailedReviews.text: Great neighborhood place, really friendly staff. Love the Big Bambino pizzas for kid parties

detailedReviews.author: Bonnie M.
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in Central Kentucky! Fresh dough, sauce, and toppings. Tons of delicious sides to choose from! Absolutely love Big City! Got a customer for life!

detailedReviews.author: Cindy Crank
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza and the customer service was out of this world. Clean, welcoming atmosphere! Will definitely come here again when I‚Äôm in Lexington!

detailedReviews.author: Sara Osborne
detailedReviews.text: The manager let my tired kiddo pick a movie to watch. It made waiting a pleasant experience!

detailedReviews.author: Danell Hill
detailedReviews.text: Delivery was fast and friendly. Pizzas were fantastic.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Martin
detailedReviews.text: The people at this location are always so kind and the food is always hot and delicious. It is my go to on busy nights when the kids have me running to practices and games after work. Give them a try you won‚Äôt be sorry!

detailedReviews.author: Gabriel Urbina
detailedReviews.text: La atenci√≥n es horrible y aparte lo colocan a esperar a uno con falsas promesas de 10minutos‚Ä¶ Hoy hice un pedido y se tardaron 35min en entregarmelo‚Ä¶. Te lo recomiendo solo si est√°s dispuesto a esperar y a que te traten mal‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: Flecia Adkins
detailedReviews.text:
Very cozy, Great place to take your family.
Food is absolutely amazing ‚ù§Ô∏è They even have games for your kids to play while you eat and coloring!!!!!!!
If they mess anything up they are more than happy to fix the issue. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! I highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Kyera bith
detailedReviews.text: The service was amazing. Very quick willing to accommodate special asks for a pizza and extremely fast with making the pizza. I cant remember the young Mans name who took my order but he also mad my pie and its had got to be in my top 5 pizzas I've had in recent memory. Nice doughy texture with a glue like cheese and perfectly crisped pepperoni. Great pizza great service. Only downside was the sound from the claw machine but to be fair i did choose to sit right next to it so that ones in me. 9.2/10

detailedReviews.author: Rhody Jo
detailedReviews.text: Had a coupon for a free pizza. Ordered beef topping, but only got a little beef. I'd try again to see if it gets better.

detailedReviews.author: AnthonyLeeBand
detailedReviews.text: They don‚Äôt cook the food enough,  I had to cook it in my oven at home!

detailedReviews.author: Wanda Quiles
detailedReviews.text: This is my go to spot when I come here on vacation, I've been getting pizza here for a couple years now and it's always been delicious. However this time I decided to get a calzone figuring it would be pretty easy and it should be good considering the pizza is great...Ohh So Not the case. Being originally from New England I was under the impression that a calzone was a self-explanatory item... Traditionally it's pizza folded in half with main ingredients ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese and then you add whatever toppings you'd like to put inside.. some places add a little buttery garlic on top of the dough or even on the inside to make it more flavorful but never have I ever heard of the main ingredient to be mozzarella cheese and sauce because that would be stromboli... Confused as I was I tried to order it in the traditional fashion and it did not come out great... It was flat kind of like a stromboli saturated in butter and garlic it was so heavy and greasy with very little ricotta cheese inside. I was so disappointed, though I will get pizza again,  I will never order a calzone from here.ü§∑

detailedReviews.author: Roisewell McCoy
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is always hot and delicious! Definitely

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth
detailedReviews.text: This restaurant is amazing! This was my first time here and the food was delicious. Amanda the general manager was so kind and even gave us a sample of their bourbon glaze for our wings and i definitely recommend! If you‚Äôre in the area this is definitely a great place to go!

detailedReviews.author: Bella Rae
detailedReviews.text: My family‚Äôs favorite place to eat! Always fast and yummy with great customer serviceüëç

detailedReviews.author: Quilio Mitchell
detailedReviews.text:
Best food I‚Äôve ever had the tipsy chicken is amazing
Andrew was very handsome and helpful

detailedReviews.author: Shelia Young
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a Chicago pizza with Italian sausage and pepperoni. It had a few pieces of sausage on it and no pepperoni at all.  I won't order that again but I will give them another chance. That's due to Amanda who reached out to make it right!  But I'll only order if she's working.  Thanks Amanda!

detailedReviews.author: Diana Ford
detailedReviews.text: Little lady was working by herself. Took care of everyone... In a timely matter. She did a GREAT job, first time customers, will be BACK... WOOHOO

detailedReviews.author: Darragh Sweeney
detailedReviews.text: So I made an online order with pepperoni and jalape√±o toppings.after picking it up and not realizing untill I got home that  On the entire pizza there was MAYBE 6 pieces of pepperoni. When I called the attitude from the employee was terrible. I brought the pizza back he ‚Äúre-made‚Äù it for me. This time the pizza was just barely cooked the  dough was still raw and there was so much cheese on it the first few layers were hardly melted thus creating the crust base to be soggy. I would have been better off buying a $5 frozen pizza from the grocery store. I would never again get a pizza from here even if it was free. Terrible

detailedReviews.author: Rose Richardson
detailedReviews.text: I typically go to the one in Hamburg, this location left a lot to be desired. My order was wrong, we had to listen to a consistent beeping, employees were barely around. We were the only people in the restaurant at the time with three employees present.

detailedReviews.author: Kasey R
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was delicious. I asked for no green peppers and paid extra for banana peppers. I didn't get the banana peppers and they put on the green peppers lol. We survived.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Brashears
detailedReviews.text: When this place is on its game, it is THE best pizza in Lex. Not even close. Skip Chicago, get the NY style or the thin. Both are really good.  Wish they had longer hours.

detailedReviews.author: Sydney Walker
detailedReviews.text: Visited for the first time for Lexington Pizza and it was so good! We loved both pizzas and the staff were so friendly and helpful!

detailedReviews.author: Matt Hulsing
detailedReviews.text: Horrible pizza. Grease so heavy it is leaking through the box. Owner/manager said they would fix and refund. Now 3 weeks later nothing fixed and he gets this post. Better pizza anywhere else.

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Daniels
detailedReviews.text: Everyone is nice and the food AMAZING!!

detailedReviews.author: randi jackson
detailedReviews.text: 10/10, pizza is amazing

detailedReviews.author: Kristi In Christ
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza shop in town with terrific service and great food! Bring your family and friends! ‚ò∫

detailedReviews.author: Elliott Graves
detailedReviews.text: I've given this place so many chances. And every time they have Successfully disappointed me.. The  latest being greasy sloppy chicago style pizza if your going to sell something atleast execute it well..... do better.

detailedReviews.author: luvtub_ca
detailedReviews.text: Not our best choice during our visit to the area.  The menu included interesting pizza combinations.  One ordered a salad and the employee went to the neighboring grocery store and purchased a salad!  Pizza was made there but appeared to be boxed.  Took almost 45 minutes to get our order - only two tables to wait on.   Unfortunately, we were under the impression that there was a huge recent change in personnel.  At least we hope that was the case.  About ten orders came through with pick up orders - several were "weekend dad" appearing.  Overall:  Average at best was our conclusion.

detailedReviews.author: Bobby W
detailedReviews.text: Fitst time eating there since before covid and it was awesome.  We had a large group and they treated us like kings.  The food was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Alexander Nair
detailedReviews.text: This place used to have the best NY style pizza in town. Now it‚Äôs not even NY thin crust style, it‚Äôs basically a pan pizza. I very disappointed. This was me giving them a second chance, but it was disappointing again. If you want NY style, don‚Äôt get it from here. I myself will not longer be returning.

detailedReviews.author: jerin justice
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food! New favorite place!

detailedReviews.author: Curtis Dixon
detailedReviews.text: New York style pizza is not even close.  Sauce is good but not 8n the style of traditional thin crust New York cheese pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Casey Vanover
detailedReviews.text:
The Tipsy Chicken pizza from Big City Pizza is an absolute delight for the taste buds. From the first bite, I was blown away by the perfect combination of flavors and textures. The succulent pieces of grilled chicken are generously spread across the pizza, providing a juicy and tender bite in every slice. The crispy bacon adds a delightful smoky sweetness that perfectly complements the savory chicken.

What sets this pizza apart is the unique twist of the bourbon glaze which adds a tangy and slightly spicy kick to the overall flavor profile. The sauce is perfectly balanced, not overpowering the other ingredients but enhancing them instead. The crust is just right! providing a satisfying crunch with each bite. The combination of flavors in the Tipsy Chicken pizza is truly a match made in pizza heaven, and I find myself craving it time and time again. Big City Pizza has truly created a masterpiece with this pizza, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a delicious and satisfying meal.

detailedReviews.author: Diane Dornan
detailedReviews.text: I only got a partial picture cause we were to hungry to wait. Were traveling from IL and ordered pizza our last night. Pizza arrive on time but was only warm at best, which wasn't terrible, but the cheese.....where did it go? The outer like 3 inches of our pizza had no cheese. It was like all heaped in the middle and that's it. Called restaurant to just basically let them know and the lady was like well you know we only put like 2 1/2c for XL. I was like its not a problem with the quantity of cheese you put on it's the placement. I'm sure your customers will not be coming back if only 1/2 of their pizza now comes with cheese . I would have given it 1 star, but on a good note, their cinna knots were awesome! Made up for disappointing pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Nash A
detailedReviews.text: Love this place and the service they provided me, I will definitely be coming back!!!

detailedReviews.author: Pruette Whitt
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic service and excellent pizza tonight from Big City Pizza!  And the cheese sticks were awesome too!

detailedReviews.author: Karen Rodes
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve ordered from Big City for years and have always loved it.  Tonight it was below average.   Very little cheese and only in center of pizza.  Inches left from the crust.  Asked for Parmesan garlic on crust and was totally dry.  Will think again before ordering from here which makes me sad

detailedReviews.author: Tamara Cameron
detailedReviews.text: We used to get this all the time and I absolutely loved it. Over time the service has seemed to go down‚Äî pick up and delivery. It seemed like they didn‚Äôt even know where people‚Äôs completed pizzas were in the back and there was a line of people waiting to even be acknowledged.

detailedReviews.author: Noah Youngson
detailedReviews.text: Quite poor service. They didn't cut my pizza the way I ordered, and I'm quite certain the server who rung me out was drunk.

detailedReviews.author: Danielle griffing
detailedReviews.text: Rudest staff I‚Äôve ever encountered. Do better.

detailedReviews.author: Lori Meadows
detailedReviews.text: Low effort

detailedReviews.author: steven lechner
detailedReviews.text: This is definitely the best pizza I‚Äôve had in the Lexington area!! As someone who was born in NY and takes pizzas pretty seriously this place has amazing food and great service with great people!

detailedReviews.author: Charla Howard
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is good but is never ready when they say it will be. I even called to confirm the pick up time, and still waited over 20 minutes.

detailedReviews.author: buzzau96
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is great but service is not.  Too many mistakes with orders.  Not worth the hassle.  Go to Joe B‚Äôs instead

detailedReviews.author: Glen Heck
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!  The originals are exceptional

detailedReviews.author: Chris Campbell
detailedReviews.text: Pizza taste was‚Ä¶meh. Food: The pizza was NOT what we ordered, wrong ingredients by a long shot. Service: asked for delivery, was told it would be 25-30 minutes. At 35 minutes got a call that the driver had a family issue and couldn‚Äôt deliver so I‚Äôd have to pick up. We won‚Äôt be back.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Smith
detailedReviews.text: Visiting from Wisconsin and this food rocks! I purchased 2 specialty pizzas (3 cheese Mac &Cheese and The Hudson) 2 orders of Statue of Liberty sticks, and 2 orders of Navy Pier Garlic Knots! I have nothing bad to say other than they are not local to Wisconsin!

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Ballard
detailedReviews.text: This is some of the best pizza in the Lexington area. It's unfortunate that they don't open up until the afternoon.

detailedReviews.author: Gary padgett
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza roomie Inside

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.8/5 rating from 100 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the pizza's quality, describing it as "amazing," "phenomenal," and "the best pizza in Lexington," with specific mentions of the Chicago Deep Dish and gluten-free options being particularly delicious. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The staff is frequently described as "super friendly," "attentive," and providing "great service," which enhances the overall dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant offers smooth and quick service, with customers appreciating the speed and organization of both in-store and delivery experiences. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and order inaccuracies - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Terrance Strong
positive.text: $14.99 deal on XL 2 Topping, great local chain!

positive.author: Kara Hughes
positive.text: The staff is always swift and nice when I come in. They seem to be very organized. I love the atmosphere of the pizzeria. It has its own unique vibe. Ive only ever ordered out. I‚Äôm very picky about my pizza preferences so this place is very dear to me. Their pizza is spot on every time. I highly recommend giving it a try! I don‚Äôt go anywhere else for my pizza!

positive.author: Hyper Detailing
positive.text: Truly a great experience! Super smooth and quick service.

neutral.author: Rhody Jo
neutral.text: Had a coupon for a free pizza. Ordered beef topping, but only got a little beef. I'd try again to see if it gets better.

neutral.author: Wanda Quiles
neutral.text: This is my go to spot when I come here on vacation, I've been getting pizza here for a couple years now and it's always been delicious. However this time I decided to get a calzone figuring it would be pretty easy and it should be good considering the pizza is great...Ohh So Not the case. Being originally from New England I was under the impression that a calzone was a self-explanatory item... Traditionally it's pizza folded in half with main ingredients ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese and then you add whatever toppings you'd like to put inside.. some places add a little buttery garlic on top of the dough or even on the inside to make it more flavorful but never have I ever heard of the main ingredient to be mozzarella cheese and sauce because that would be stromboli... Confused as I was I tried to order it in the traditional fashion and it did not come out great... It was flat kind of like a stromboli saturated in butter and garlic it was so heavy and greasy with very little ricotta cheese inside. I was so disappointed, though I will get pizza again,  I will never order a calzone from here.ü§∑

neutral.author: Shelia Young
neutral.text: Ordered a Chicago pizza with Italian sausage and pepperoni. It had a few pieces of sausage on it and no pepperoni at all.  I won't order that again but I will give them another chance. That's due to Amanda who reached out to make it right!  But I'll only order if she's working.  Thanks Amanda!

negative.author: Ashley Randall
negative.text: I keep trying to give you all a chance because the food is actually delicious but every single time I have ordered the order has been wrong. This time, the staff was rude and the food took multiple hours when we were told 40 minutes. Do better! Or don't, I won't be back again and I'd say the 20 other customers who complained while I was there waiting, won't be back either! It's a darn shame, so much potential.

negative.author: Tracy
negative.text: There was no flavor and it was missing the main topping I wanted. Management seems to provide a canned response to everyone with no offer to make it right. Will not be returning.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
